overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by 183-day rule or by having a center of economic interest in Peru.
overview.tax_authority: Superintendencia Nacional de Aduanas y de Administración Tributaria (SUNAT)

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Exemptions and deductions for medical expenses, donations and other specific items are available.

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 20% for businesses with annual sales below 1,700,000 PEN.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 5% (increased to 30% if not reinvested in Peru)

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Real estate and certain other assets may be exempt.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 8% on basic necessities, medicines and professional services.

property_tax.rate: 0.2% - 1.2% of assessed value, depending on location and type of property.
property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence may be eligible for exemptions.

inheritance_tax.rate: Variable depending on the value of the inheritance and relationship to the deceased.
inheritance_tax.exemptions: Spouses, children and other direct descendants are exempt.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from crypto is subject to general income tax rates.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from crypto are subject to a 5% capital gains tax.
crypto_tax.mining_tax: Mining income is taxed as business income.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFTs is subject to general income tax rates.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFTs are subject to a 5% capital gains tax.

additional_notes.political_risks: Some political instability may impact tax regulations.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Peruvian economy is subject to fluctuations which may impact tax revenue.
additional_notes.legal_system: Tax laws are subject to interpretations and changes.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 106th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
